definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: The Grain Budding shows that crops that will ripen in summer start to show plump seeds.
sentences.chinese: 小满表示在夏季成熟的农作物籽粒开始饱满了。

sentences.english: In many countries, it also sets itself automatically to summer and winter time.
sentences.chinese: 在许多国家，它本身也设置自动夏季和冬季。

sentences.english: The summer rainstorm was also one of the meteorological disasters which reduce the production of large cherry.
sentences.chinese: 夏季暴雨也是影响大樱桃生产的气象灾害之一。

sentences.english: The climate here is always hot, summer and winter alike .
sentences.chinese: 这里的气候总是那么热，夏季和冬季都一样。

sentences.english: The window is never open except in summer.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户从来不开，夏季除外。

sentences.english: This torch is then carried by a relay of runners to the site of the Summer or Winter games.
sentences.chinese: 之后这支火炬由跑者接力送至夏季或冬季比赛地点。

sentences.english: Judy earned money for her college education by slinging hash in a fast-food restaurant during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 朱蒂夏季在快餐店里端盘子赚上大学的学费。

sentences.english: It in the test of whether we can fit the summer heat and winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 它在考验我们是否能适合夏季的炎热和冬季的寒冷。

sentences.english: I reminded myself then and there that in the cold of the winter I would wish I had this heat.
sentences.chinese: 立即告诉站在严寒里的自己，希望能拥有夏季的炎热。

sentences.english: During summer, Kiwi birds have a tough time surviving the rodent population boom.
sentences.chinese: 夏季，啮齿动物数量大增，鹬鸵生存艰难。

sentences.english: Tropical summers of 24hr sunlight are replaced by freezing winters of continuous night.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬季，夏季不断的酷热被连续的夜间严寒所代。

sentences.english: And of course there were a number of location-based searches surrounding the World Cup, which took place in South Africa over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 当然，还有大量的关于夏季南非世界杯的本地搜索。

sentences.english: The temperature there may be 5 times higher in summer as compared to winter.
sentences.chinese: 那里的温度夏季可能比冬季高5倍。

sentences.english: Mung bean soup is a well known summer better Jieshu drinks.
sentences.chinese: 绿豆汤是人人皆知的夏季较好的解暑饮料。

sentences.english: Who doesn't love fresh basil in the summer?
sentences.chinese: 夏季谁会不喜欢清新的罗勒呢？

sentences.english: If a long time in the outdoors, summer, umbrella is the best approach.
sentences.chinese: 如果长时间在室外，夏季打伞是最好的办法。
